title: How to be a kinder, more caring neighbor
description: What does it mean to be a kinder, more caring neighbor? From Daniel Tiger's world of make-believe to Winnipeg, here's how to plug into your community, practice small acts of kindness and boost your mood. We'll also think critically about being neighborly when things get complicated.

itunes:summary: What does it mean to be a good neighbor? From Daniel Tiger's Neighbor's world of make-believe to Winnipeg, here's how to plug into your community and practice kindness.
